channel.title: Why do all servers need their own client?
channel.description: I want to host a server again, but all the sources I find is sources which you need the client for to play. Does this means that everyone who wants to join my server has to download the client? Why have it become like this?

item.title: Why do all servers need their own client?
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:11, topic:381996”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=477800.msg3496744#msg3496744 date=1297379092]
Do you realize that all of the sponsored servers you have obviously are going to have custom items and NPC’s not on your client? People won’t want to play with those servers. Or any server with your client.
[/quote]

But, mitb… how will you incorporate customs!!!
Nobody cares, but just a random question.

MoparScape 4 is nothing but a loader that will run anything inside of it that implements a certain interface. That means anyone who wants to run a custom client can run it inside MoparScape, good enough? :)[/quote]

OH.

Sweet, that’s a good idea then.

Read full topic
item.source: Why do all servers need their own client?

item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Oh ok then. They’ll still be allowed to have custom client downloads?

n10si t:

Do you realize that all of the sponsored servers you have obviously are going to have custom items and NPC’s not on your client? People won’t want to play with those servers. Or any server with your client.

[quote=“ytuio9, post:10, topic:381996”]But, mitb… how will you incorporate customs!!!
Nobody cares, but just a random question.[/quote]

MoparScape 4 is nothing but a loader that will run anything inside of it that implements a certain interface. That means anyone who wants to run a custom client can run it inside MoparScape, good enough?

item.title: Why do all servers need their own client?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:8, topic:381996”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=477800.msg3496722#msg3496722 date=1297376991]
Many servers say they need their own client, but allow connections from MoparScape.

Also in the near future, all servers on the server status page will be required to use MoparScape.
[/quote]

That’ll work. Ha.

Do you realize that all of the sponsored servers you have obviously are going to have custom items and NPC’s not on your client? People won’t want to play with those servers. Or any server with your client.[/quote]

TOO BAD FOR THEM!

Read full topic
